name: The Last Tree (itch) (LosTopillos)
description:
In a dystopian world full of pollution, a lonely mole tries to save the last living tree.

Move and grab the mutant monsters before they can eat the tree's roots. 

Game developed for the Global Game Jam 2023.

Team:

  • Game Design: Pedro Romero (@Pedro_Romero94)
  • Programming: Santiago Marín (@VertroxMT)
  • Art: Nora García (nordeva.com)

Sound Powered by Krilloud
